alert.note: Alert for Putnam (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 6:38PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Putnam County through 715 PM EDT... At 637 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Glandorf, or near Ottawa, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ottawa around 650 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Leipsic. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
